de: Mittelschwere Wanderung im Massif de la Trevaresse.
en: Medium level hike in the Trevaresse massif.
it: Escursione di medio livello nel massiccio della Trevaresse.
fr: Randonnée de niveau moyen dans le massif de la Trevaresse.
nl: Wandeling van gemiddeld niveau in het Trevaresse massief.
es: Caminata de nivel medio en el macizo de Trevaresse.

fr: Trevaresse - St Cannat, Fontaine de Doudonne

en:
1. Leave the car park on the left, avenue Victor Hugo (D18). Pass a wash house (on the right), the Place Gambetta (Fountain) and the Place de la République. Cross the avenue Camille Pelletan (D7N) with care and at a pedestrian crossing. Turn right for 100 m. then left onto Avenue Paul Lafargue. Pass in front of the 17th century chapel of Saint-Cannat, cross Avenue Jean Moulin, the small road runs alongside housing estates before reaching a junction.
2. Turn left onto the Chemin du Puy (tarmac), which runs through farmland and a few isolated houses. At the end of the road, continue on a dirt track, past a shed. The path rises gently, turns left, crosses a private property, passes beehives (for your safety: don't disturb them!) and the Barounette water reserve (Société du Canal de Provence). Continue on the paved path for 50m.
3. Turn left, onto the ridges, the path runs alongside vineyards, the view extends to the Luberon, then further on to Saint-Cannat. Go past a large field of rosemary, along the fence of the Etape property. 
At an intersection of paths (the fence turns right).
4. Go down to the left, the path crosses a hillside and 200 m further on, fork to the right, the path goes down into the woods, along a low wall, arrives on a track. Take it to the right, along a fence until you reach an intersection.
5. Go left, along the terraced vineyards and olive trees, turn left at the end of the olive field (access to a borie by going up to the left on the plateau). Otherwise, turn left along an old canal, at the edge of a wood to reach the intersection. Follow the canal to the right (sunken path), take a path to the right and further to the left between wooden fences to find the canal again.
6. You can reduce the length of the route by 4km by taking the alternative route from here. Alternatively, go up to the right, further left to access the sports course, the Doudonne fountain, and the picnic area. Continue up to the ridge - information panel for the town of Saint Cannat.
7. Turn left to follow the small road that leads to the D18.
8. Follow it to the right and then cross it and follow it for 30 m.
9. Turn left onto a path that runs along hillsides and vineyards in a beautiful, open landscape with views of the coastline. The path turns south-west and becomes a small road.
10. Go right towards the north, towards a hut, the vegetation is short. The path then turns west. After a house, turn left to join the small road. Pass a stud farm before a slope. After this last climb, you will see the village. Follow the small road to the right, along the cypress hedges it leads to a housing estate and communal facilities (gymnasium, schools...).
11. Turn left to find the D18 and the Avenue Jules Guesde. Cross the D7N on the pedestrian crossing on the right and join the car park by the Place Gambetta, the Bd Marcel Parraud and the Chemin de la Lecque.

de: Im Zentrum des guten Lebens und der zauberhaften Landschaften der Region von Aix führt das Programm dieser schönen Wanderung vom provenzalischen Dorf Saint-Cannat in die bewaldete Garrigue. Wenn man das Dorf über die ehemalige Nationalstraße N7 durchquert, bemerkt man nicht, dass Saint-Cannat landwirtschaftlich genutzte Böden im Überfluss hat und über das gesamte Arsenal ländlich-provenzalischer Klischees verfügt. Wege zwischen Weinbergen und Olivenhainen, Gebäude aus Trockenstein (bories), Wasserreserven, Unterholz mit Kiefern und Eichen, Bienenstöcke, Rosmarinfelder, Bastiden und einsame Bauernhöfe, ein schöner Springbrunnen, Zypressenhecken und vieles mehr. Fünf Stunden Fußmarsch (weniger, wenn man die Abkürzung wählt), um sich mit einer gewissen Vorstellung von der ursprünglichen Provence auszusöhnen, wobei man sich nie mehr als 2 oder 3 km vom Dorf entfernen muss. Wie es sich für einen ansteigenden Pfad gehört, muss man auch hier nicht auf die Aussicht weitentfernter Reliefs und Bauten der Umgebung verzichten: die Chaîne des Côtes und die rotbraunen Dachziegel der Häuser von Saint-Cannat.
en: Spanning a Provençal market town and typical forest of low-lying "garrigue" shrubland, this enchanting walk is set in the countryside around Saint-Cannat, right at the heart of the delicious landscapes and lifestyle of the Aix region. Although its difficult to guess when you cross the village via the old N7 road, Saint-Cannat actually abounds with agricultural land and the sort of rural sights you can only see in Provence, such as little footpaths winding between the vines, olive trees, reservoirs, pine and oak woods, bee hives, rosemary fields, bastides and isolated farms, a beautiful fountain, cypress hedges... and much, much more. Never more than a couple of kilometres away from the nearest village, this 5-hour itinerary (less if you take the shortcut) offers you a full immersion in the trad spirit of Provence. Without forgetting, naturellement, a few healthy climbs to allow you to admire the neighbouring Chaîne des Côtes mountain chain and brick-red roof tiles of Saint-Cannat.
it: Dal borgo provenzale alla foresta, ecco il programma di questa passeggiata nella campagna di Saint-Cannat, nel cuore di un Pays d'Aix dove il ritmo della vita è moderato e i paesaggi sono incantevoli. Attraversando il paese per la ex statale N7 non ci si rende conto che Saint-Cannat è in realtà ricca di terreni agricoli e impregnata della tipicità rurale della Provenza. Sentieri tracciati tra vigne e ulivi, bories, serbatoi d'acqua, boschi di pini e querce, alveari, distese di rosmarino, bastide e fattorie isolate, una bella fontana, filari di cipressi … Cinque ore di passeggiata (meno se si prende la scorciatoia) per riconciliarsi con una certa idea di Provenza originale, senza mai allontanarsi dal paese per più di 2 o 3 chilometri. Certamente senza dimenticare l'inevitabile sentiero in salita che porta più lontano lo sguardo, sui rilievi e sulle costruzioni circostanti: la catena delle Côtes e le tegole rosso scuro delle case di Saint-Cannat.
fr: Typiques de la Provence intérieure, les paysages du pays d'Aix et de Salon font la part belle à la culture, favorisée par un réseau de canaux d'irrigation. Dans les plaines, sur les collines, semées de belles bastides campagnardes, alternent champs de blé, parcelles maraîchères, vergers, oliveraies, vignes, tel un catalogue des plus emblématiques productions de la région. Au printemps, quand les fruitiers se couvrent de fleurs, que la nature verdit, la région prend des allures de pays béni. Petits légumes, premiers fruits, herbes aromatiques, fromages de chèvre frais apparaissent sur les marchés, vendus par des maraîchers et producteurs qui en garantissent la qualité. Entre la beauté opulente des paysages et les prodigalités d'une nature savamment cultivée réside une bonne partie de la douceur de vivre.
es: Típicos de la Provenza interior, los paisajes del Pays d'Aix y de Salon dan prioridad al cultivo, favorecido por una red de canales de riego. En las llanuras, en las colinas, salpicadas de hermosas bastidas campestres, se alternan campos de trigo, parcelas de huerta, huertos, olivares y viñedos, como un catálogo de las producciones más emblemáticas de la región. En primavera, cuando los árboles frutales se cubren de flores, cuando la naturaleza se vuelve verde, la región parece una tierra bendita. En los mercados aparecen pequeñas hortalizas, primicias, hierbas aromáticas, queso de cabra fresco, vendidos por hortelanos y productores que garantizan su calidad. Entre la opulenta belleza de los paisajes y las prodigalidades de una naturaleza hábilmente cultivada se encuentra buena parte de la dulzura de la vida.
nl: De landschappen van de Pays d'Aix en Salon, die typisch zijn voor het binnenland van de Provence, staan in het teken van de teelt en worden begunstigd door een netwerk van irrigatiekanalen. In de vlakten, op de heuvels, bezaaid met prachtige landhuizen, wisselen graanvelden, tuinbouwpercelen, boomgaarden, olijfbomen en wijngaarden elkaar af, als een catalogus van de meest emblematische producties van de streek. In de lente, wanneer de fruitbomen bedekt zijn met bloemen, wanneer de natuur groen wordt, ziet de streek eruit als een gezegend land. Op de markten verschijnen kleine groenten, eerste vruchten, aromatische kruiden, verse geitenkaas, verkocht door tuinders en producenten die garant staan voor hun kwaliteit. Tussen de weelderige schoonheid van de landschappen en de uitspattingen van een kunstig gecultiveerde natuur ligt een goed deel van de lieflijkheid van het leven.
